name: NyX 'The Chaos Tot'
description:
Those gross mammalian creatures from the milky way have infested new regions of deep-space. At just a mere 14 Billion years old, "NYX' the god tot has been tasked with ridding planet X.5 of the new pest and harvesting the chaos.

Type: Game, PC [keyboard-mouse] | Puzzle, Casual
-
Controls:
move = Left Mouse Click on active objects
-
Loop:
Destroy the 'double high-rise' buildings using horizontal attacks, before air assault levels the area with tnt.
-
